snippet: The Giants' secondary and Rob Gronkowski's ankle played outsize roles in the outcome. But the Patriots did not lose the game - the Giants won it.
abstract: The Giants' secondary and Rob Gronkowski's ankle played outsize roles in the outcome. But the Patriots did not lose the game - the Giants won it.
lead_paragraph: Andy Benoit contributes weekly film analysis to The Fifth Down. He is an N.F.L. analyst for CBSSports.com and the founder of NFLTouchdown.com. He can be reached at andy.benoit@NFLTouchdown.com or @Andy_Benoit.

headline.main: Super Bowl 46 Film Review, and Defending Brady
